Sensorless control of 3-phase brushless DC motors Documentation

Atmel AVR Application Note

Introduction

This documents data structures, functions, variables, defines, enums, and typedefs in the software for application note AVR444.

Compilation Info

This software was written for the IAR Embedded Workbench 4.11A.

To make project:

  1. Add the file main.c to project.
  2. Under processor configuration, select device ATmega48, ATmega88 or ATmega168
  3. Enable bit definitions in I/O include files
  4. Under "C/C++ compiler->Code->Register utilization", select 5 registers (R11..R15) locked for global variables.
  5. High optimization on speed is recommended for best performance

Device Info

The included source code is written for ATmega48/88/168.
